hero.title: Unlock your leadership potential
hero.subtitle: Transform your leadership style and amplify your impact. Through 1-on-1 coaching, I help executives and emerging leaders develop the skills, mindset, and emotional intelligence to lead with confidence and authenticity.

about.title: Leadership Transformation
about.subtitle: Personalized coaching for high-performers
about.content: I work with ambitious leaders who want to elevate their performance, navigate complex challenges, and create lasting impact. Through deep listening, powerful questions, and proven frameworks, we unlock insights that lead to breakthrough results.

products.name: Executive Coaching Package
products.description: 12 weekly 1-hour sessions with unlimited email support. Includes 360 assessment and personalized development plan.

products.name: Leadership Intensive
products.description: 6-session focused program on a specific leadership challenge. Deep work on communication, influence, or team dynamics.

products.name: Career Transition Coaching
products.description: Navigate career changes with clarity and confidence. Ideal for executives considering new roles or industries.

products.name: Team Leadership Workshop
products.description: Full-day workshop for leadership teams. Build trust, improve communication, and align on vision.

products.name: Discovery Session
products.description: Complimentary 45-minute session to explore your goals and see if we're a good fit.

products.name: Monthly Retainer
products.description: Ongoing coaching support with 2 sessions per month plus email and phone access.

services.title: Coaching Services
services.subtitle: Personalized programs for your leadership journey

items.text: Working with Dr. Anderson changed my entire approach to leadership. I'm more confident, my team is more engaged, and I was promoted to VP. Best investment in my career.
items.author: Jennifer Roberts
items.title: VP of Operations

items.text: The coaching helped me navigate a difficult career transition with clarity. I'm now in a role that aligns with my values and strengths. Couldn't have done it without this support.
items.author: Michael Chen
items.title: Director of Strategy

items.text: As a new executive, I was struggling with imposter syndrome. The coaching gave me tools to lead authentically and the confidence to trust my voice. Game-changing.
items.author: Sarah Martinez
items.title: Chief Marketing Officer

members.name: Dr. Alexandra Anderson
members.title: Executive Coach & Leadership Consultant
members.bio: Former Fortune 500 executive turned coach. PhD in Organizational Psychology. ICF-certified with 15+ years helping leaders unlock their potential and create meaningful impact.
